title: Alibaba : number of employees 2018 , by department
summary: This graph shows the percentage of the staff in different industries that are Alibaba , compared to female number in Operations_and_customer_service .

Operations_and_customer_service are shown to have the fewest Alibaba of these Department , about 6494 % , while the Research_and_development Department employs the largest proportion of Alibaba at 24964 % .
gold: The statistic shows the number of full-time employees of the Alibaba Group , sorted by department . As of March 2018 , the Chinese e-commerce corporation had 24,964 full-time employees working in operations and customer service .
